citations.narrative:
The facility does not currently have a contingency plan. In the event of an emergency or disaster, animal health may be
further jeopardized without careful planning to mitigate animal impacts. Licensees must develop, document, and follow an
appropriate plan to provide for the humane handling, treatment, transportation, housing, and care of their animals in the
event of an emergency or disaster.
Correct by: October 1, 2025
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.134(a) 
   
Contingency planning. 
The facility does not currently have a contingency plan. In the event of an emergency or disaster, animal health may be 
further jeopardized without careful planning to mitigate animal impacts. Licensees must develop, document, and follow an 
appropriate plan to provide for the humane handling, treatment, transportation, housing, and care of their animals in the 
event of an emergency or disaster. 
 
Correct by: October 1, 2025 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative. 
 
 n
